template.name: Template Linux-APP-MySQL-ACTIVE
template.description: Need scripts, userparameters and conf files from: https://github.com/kleinstuff/zabbixtemplates

item.name: MySQL mysqlcheck
item.description: Uses a userparameter and mysqlcheck to verify corrupted tables. Returns "0" if no errors found.

item.name: Number of MySQL databases
item.description: Return the number of MySQL databases, except for: - mysql - information_schema - performance_schema

item.name: MySQL status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: MySQL Total Data Size
item.description:
Needs User Parameter:
UserParameter=mysql.size[*],echo "select sum($(case "$3" in both|"") echo "data_length+index_length";; data|index) echo "$3_length";; free) echo "data_free";; esac)) from information_schema.tables$([[ "$1" = "all" || ! "$1" ]] || echo " where table_schema='$1'")$([[ "$2" = "all" || ! "$2" ]] || echo "and table_name='$2'");" | HOME=/app/zabbix mysql -N

item.name: MySQL bytes received per second
item.description:
The number of bytes received from all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL bytes sent per second
item.description:
The number of bytes sent to all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL begin operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL commit operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL delete operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL insert operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL rollback operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL select operations per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL update operations per second
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf:
UserParameter=mysql.status[*],echo "show global status where Variable_name='$1';" | HOME=/app/zabbix mysql -N | awk '{print $$2}'

item.name: MySQL queries per second
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL slow queries
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL uptime
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL version
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.uptime, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL memory usage
item.description: Returns the amount of memory used by MySQL

discovery_rule.name: MySQL Databases discovery
discovery_rule.description: Return all databases except "mysql", "performance_schema", "test" and "information_schema". Need discovery script and userparameter from: https://github.com/kleinstuff

item_prototype.name: Database: $1 size
item_prototype.description: Returns de size in bytes of a discovered database.

item_prototype.name: Database: $1 number of tables
item_prototype.description: Return the number of tables of a discovered database.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME}: The number of tables on MySQL database $1 has changed
trigger_prototype.description: The number of tables of this database has changed between the last and current checks.

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME}: MySQLCheck errors found
trigger.description: mysqlcheck has returned errors, please verify manually.

trigger.name: {HOSTNAME}: Number of MySQL Databases has changed
trigger.description: The number of MySQL databases has changed between the last and the current checks.
